body:
So what has your favourite/best school trip been?

Mine was definitely when our school football team went to Italy to play multiple teams and we won every game but 1.

Sooo, leave yours below!

Yeeet!

replies.body: In Glasgow, we had to go Wales and chill out there, we went Cycling, trekking, canoeing and various other active things. The lads had some great banter and some even crept into the girls section, what absolute mugs! ^.^ We also had xBox and Playstation 3, Pool table, Table Football, bit of that ping wong pong, all fun and dandy! ^.^
replies.body_tagged: In Glasgow, we had to go Wales and chill out there, we went Cycling, trekking, canoeing and various other active things. The lads had some great banter and some even crept into the girls section, what absolute mugs! ^.^ We also had xBox and Playstation 3, Pool table, Table Football, bit of that ping wong pong, all fun and dandy! ^.^
